00020 #include "Octree.h"

00029 Octree::Octree() {
00030         this->voxelSize = 0;
00031 }
00032 
00033 Octree::~Octree() {
00034

00036 
00037 void Octree::filter(PointCloud3D* originalPointCloud, PointCloud3D* resultPointCloud) {
00038         assert(originalPointCloud != 0);
00039         assert(resultPointCloud != 0);
00040 
00041         resultPointCloud->getPointCloud()->clear();
00042 
00043         if(originalPointCloud->getSize() == 0) {
00044                 return; //Nothing to do here..
00045         }
00046 
00047         if (voxelSize <=0) {
00048                 for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(originalPointCloud->getSize()); ++i) { //just copy data
00049                         resultPointCloud->addPoint((*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i]);
00050                 }
00051                 return;
00052         }
00053 
00054         /* prepare data */
00055         double** tmpPointCloudPoints = new double*[originalPointCloud->getSize()];
00056         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < originalPointCloud->getSize(); i++) {
00057                 tmpPointCloudPoints[i] = new double[3];
00058                 tmpPointCloudPoints[i][0] = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00059                 tmpPointCloudPoints[i][1] = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY();
00060                 tmpPointCloudPoints[i][2] = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();
00061         }
00062 
00063         /* create octree */
00064         OctTree *octree = new OctTree(tmpPointCloudPoints, originalPointCloud->getSize(), this->voxelSize);
00065 
00066         /* process results */
00067         resultPointCloud->getPointCloud()->clear();
00068         vector<double*> center;
00069         center.clear();
00070         octree->GetOctTreeCenter(center);
00071 
00072         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(center.size()); ++i) {
00073                 Point3D tmpPoint = Point3D();
00074                 tmpPoint.setX(center[i][0]);
00075                 tmpPoint.setY(center[i][1]);
00076                 tmpPoint.setZ(center[i][2]);
00077                 resultPointCloud->addPoint(tmpPoint);
00078         }
00079 
00080         /* some plausibility checks */
00081         assert (resultPointCloud->getSize() == center.size());
00082 //      assert (resultPointCloud->getSize() <= originalPointCloud->getSize());
00083 
00084         /* clean up */
00085         delete octree;
00086         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(originalPointCloud->getSize()); ++i) {
00087                 delete [] tmpPointCloudPoints[i];
00088         }
00089         delete [] tmpPointCloudPoints;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void Octree::partitionPointCloud(PointCloud3D* pointCloud, std::vector<PointCloud3D*>* pointCloudCells) {
00093         assert(pointCloud != 0);
00094         assert(pointCloudCells != 0);
00095 
00096         unsigned int totalPointsCount = 0; //for plausibility check
00097 
00098         pointCloudCells->clear();
00099         if (voxelSize <=0) {
00100                 PointCloud3D* tmpPointCloud = new PointCloud3D();
00101                 for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(pointCloud->getSize()); ++i) { //just copy data
00102                         tmpPointCloud->addPoint((*pointCloud->getPointCloud())[i]);
00103                         totalPointsCount++;
00104                 }
00105                 pointCloudCells->push_back(tmpPointCloud);
00106                 assert (pointCloud->getSize() == totalPointsCount); //plausibility check
00107                 return;
00108         }
00109 
00110         /* prepare data */
00111         double** tmpPointCloudPoints = new double*[pointCloud->getSize()];
00112         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pointCloud->getSize(); i++) {
00113                 tmpPointCloudPoints[i] = new double[3];
00114                 tmpPointCloudPoints[i][0] = (*pointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00115                 tmpPointCloudPoints[i][1] = (*pointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY();
00116                 tmpPointCloudPoints[i][2] = (*pointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();
00117         }
00118 
00119         /* create octree */
00120         OctTree *octree = new OctTree(tmpPointCloudPoints, pointCloud->getSize(), this->voxelSize);
00121 
00122         /* process results */
00123         vector<vector<double*> > partition;
00124         partition.clear();
00125         octree->GetOctTreePartition(partition);
00126 
00127         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < partition.size(); ++i) { // each partition/cell
00128                 PointCloud3D* tmpPointCloud = new PointCloud3D();
00129                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < partition[i].size(); ++j) { // each point in a partition/cell
00130                         Point3D tmpPoint = Point3D();
00131                         vector<double*> tmpResultPoint;
00132                         tmpResultPoint = partition[i];
00133                         tmpPoint.setX(tmpResultPoint[j][0]);
00134                         tmpPoint.setY(tmpResultPoint[j][1]);
00135                         tmpPoint.setZ(tmpResultPoint[j][2]);
00136                         tmpPointCloud->addPoint(tmpPoint);
00137                         totalPointsCount++;
00138                 }
00139                 pointCloudCells->push_back(tmpPointCloud);
00140         }
00141 
00142         /* plausibility check */
00143         assert (pointCloud->getSize() == totalPointsCount);
00144 
00145         /* clean up */
00146         delete octree;
00147         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(pointCloud->getSize()); ++i) {
00148                 delete [] tmpPointCloudPoints[i];
00149         }
00150         delete [] tmpPointCloudPoints;
00151 }
00152 
00153 void Octree::setVoxelSize(double voxelSize) {
00154         if (voxelSize < 0.0) {
00155                 throw runtime_error("ERROR: voxelSize for Octree cannot be less than 0.");
00156         }
00157         this->voxelSize = voxelSize;
00158 }
00159 
00160 double Octree::getVoxelSize() {
00161         return this->voxelSize;
00162 }
